overview: Pigtail princesses Danni Rivers and Kate Bloom are extra small sweeties who love to take advantage of how tiny they are! But more importantly, being petite makes them sexy as hell!  Sometimes Izzy Bell just wants to relax with her boyfriend and watch a TV show, but today, he is too horny to keep his hands off her. Her step sister, Liv Wild, totally understands where her boyfriend is coming from, and agrees to convince Izzy that raw dogging is the way to go.  Emma and Mazzy are supposed to be having a special stepsister study sesh, but we would rather twerk for the cam. Too bad our pervy stepdad is super nosy! Guess we will have to teach him a lesson.  Anastasia knows her step-dad is fucking her bestie, but when he invites her to join in she's a little nervous, but excited too. After all, I have been waiting for this for a long time.
title: Twisted Threesome Tales 7
